text: Home: Original Motion Picture Soundtrack is the soundtrack album by Barbadian singer Rihanna and various artists for Home. It was released on March 23, 2015, by Westbury Road and Roc Nation. == Track listing == ==Credits and personnel== Executive producer *Robyn Rihanna Fenty Executive music producers *Robyn Rihanna Fenty *Tor Hermansen *Mikkel Eriksen Executive in charge of music for DreamWorks Animation *Sunny Park A&R; *Jay Brown *Tyran "Ty Ty" Smith *Omar Grant A&R; coordination *Justin Adams A&R; administration *Karen Console Creative direction *Ciarra Pardo (Fenty Corp.) Marketing *Dara Michelle (Roc Nation) *Gabriela Schwartz (Def Jam) Business and legal affairs *Edward Shapiro (Westbury Road Entertainment, LLC) *Christina Suarez (Roc Nation) DreamWorks Animation music department Music clearances *Julie Butchko Director of music *Charlene Ann Huang Music coordinators *Tori Fillat *Sebastian Christie Music business affairs *Kevin Breen *Emily Morchower All songs mastered by Chris Gehringer at Sterling Sound, NYC ==Charts== Chart (2015) Peak position Australian Albums (ARIA) 40 UK Soundtrack Albums (OCC) 4 == Release history == Country Date Format Label Canada March 23, 2015 Digital download Germany Italy Spain United Kingdom United States Australia March 24, 2015 Digital download Austria New Zealand Switzerland Germany March 27, 2015 CD ==References== Category:2015 albums Category:Rihanna albums Category:Pop albums Category:House albums Category:R&B; albums
title: Home (soundtrack)
